name: Psychopy experiment with Eyelink
tagline: Psychopy experiment with Eyelink eyetracking with pylink library and Datapixx2 hardware.
body:
### Welcome to the PyNeuro site

[Psychopy](http://www.psychopy.org/about/index.html) is a free and open source package for generating stimuli for psychological/neurological experiments. This program combines Psychopy with Eyelink eye-tracking and DataPixx2 hardware for synchronisation.

### Authors and Contributors
Alistair Walsh (@alistairwalsh)
Talitha Ford (@tcford)
Dr. Mark Shier
Prof. David Crewther

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with this program [documentation](https://help.github.com/pages) or [contact support](https://github.com/contact) and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
